title: Detecting Botnet Nodes via Structural Node Representation Learning
description: This talk presented research on detecting botnet nodes through structural node representation learning, offering an approach that enhances detection efficiency while reducing computational cost.

title: 2FWL-SIRGN: A Scalable Structural 2-dimensional Folklore Weisfeiler Lehman Graph Representation Learning Approach Via Structural Graph Partitioning
description: This talk introduced 2FWL-SIRGN, a scalable approach to graph representation learning that combines the 2-dimensional Folklore Weisfeiler Lehman Isomorphism Test with novel structural graph partitioning, designed for efficient large-scale applications.
